brainly_data.question: The travel time for a college student traveling between her home and her college is uniformly distributed between 40 and 90 minutes. refer to exhibit 6-2. the probability that her trip will take exactly 50 minutes is:
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: The travel time for a college student traveling between her home and her college is uniformly distributed between 40 and 90 minutes. refer to exhibit 6-2. the probability that her trip will take exactly 50 minutes is:
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text: Since this is a uniform distribution, the probability for every minute from 40 to 90 is constant at 0.02. Therefore, the probability that her trip will take exactly 50 minutes is 0.02.

top_answer.subject: Mathematics
top_answer.text: Since this is a uniform distribution, the probability for every minute from 40 to 90 is constant at 0.02. Therefore, the probability that her trip will take exactly 50 minutes is 0.02.
